summary: Applies an affine matrix to a set of points, converting between image (pixel) space and physical world space. Supports 2‑D and 3‑D coordinates, optional inversion of the matrix, and automatic handling of LPS↔RAS orientation differences, returning the transformed points in the original tensor shape.
business_intent: Facilitates accurate coordinate mapping in medical imaging workflows, allowing downstream analysis and visualization tools to work interchangeably with image‑based and world‑based point data.
